p: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). Although in December 2019, a novel coronavirus disease epidemic was already reported in Wuhan (China), the outbreak was officially confirmed as a pandemic on February 11, 2020 ( WHO, 2020). In recent weeks/months, a considerable number of papers on SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 are being published. However, there are a very important number of research questions that need prompt responses ( Yuen et al., 2020). One of this concerns the potential association between the transmission of the coronavirus 2 and the levels of air pollutants, a question that we next discuss based on data from very recent papers.
